Am I the only one with an issue in episode 6 of season 8 (The One with the Halloween Party)?
At about 16:20 it cuts and shows video that doesn't belong there. The audio keeps going like normal.. Anyone else or maybe just an issue on my side?

@ flareus1

I agree. Season 8, episode 6 has a problem where the audio stays contiguous while the video has changed to an unrelated scene and the rest of the file is off. 

There was also an error in Season 7, episode 9 where the file is corrupt right after the Friends main intro music, and closes whichever player I use abruptly. I have to manually jump past that point, to avoid the file closing on me. 

There might be more errors, but I've only watched until Season 8 episode 6 right now.

This torrent is great, brilliant in fact. However, if you were hoping to burn them straight to a disk or play them on your Television with an external hard drive - then there's a likely chance that it doesn't support .MKV. I recommend downloading each season one by one from "Seriemesteren" on TPB, it will also take less time.
01 - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4620484/Friends.Season.01-Seriemesteren
02 - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4620489/Friends.Season.02-Seriemesteren

04 - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4620499/Friends.Season.04-Seriemesteren

Useless!!!

Each episode is only around 85 mb. That is not enough for it to be of watchable quality.

Maybe this is fine for you ipod or similar. Nothing else.
ripper, x264 is better than xvid, but it's not fucking magic. You can't get good quality at all, if you compress it down to just 85 megs, at 480p.

Unwatchable on any kind of device. A still picture looks somewhat ok, but when there's any kind of movement, it's very jerky movement. But that's what you get when you make an 22 minute 480p video just 85 megs.

The truth is that this is not a torrent for collectors who wish to see this show again and again. This is for those, who want to watch it once and then delete it. Small size comes with its issues...pixels, haziness...definitely watchable..but not a keeper.

@spifkitten99 and @duranachampion

This quality is pretty much the best you're going to get. I am a collector and I used to own the whole box set on DVD, however the whole thing got damaged when I moved homes.

The quality is almost the same, the DVD collection being marginally better

Like I said before, the Friends series' quality is limited due to when it was recorded. Any tv show around that time period has the same quality such as everybody loves raymond

This quality and the original dvd is the same when watching on something like a laptop screen, however on a TV it stretches the video quite a bit ,making this torrent's mkv's pixelated, however the DVD retains most of its quality due to its size....

But if you want the best quality you can get for Friends - Then just go buy the dvds coz ur not gonna get it from downloading any type of rips
